name: Grab
title: Senior Web Engineer
desc:
Grab is a Singaporean decacorn transportation company. Currently, Grab has numerous products as a superapp and I am helping the development of the Reporting team on Merchant Experience.

Technology used: ReactJS, Redux, Jest

name: Global Tiket Network (Tiket.com)
title: Senior Frontend Engineer
desc:
Tiket.com is an online travel agent founded in 2011 which provides services to order flight ticket, hotel room, events/concerts ticket, attractions ticket, train ticket and also car rental.

Working in tiket.com is one of my great working experience because I have learned to build a good looking and functional website for our customers.

I also learned to working and growing together as a team. At first, our team only consisted of 3 persons, and now our team consists of 9 persons.

Technology used: ReactJS, Redux, GraphQL, Jest

name: Global Tiket Network (Tiket.com)

desc:
Tiket.com is an online travel agent founded in 2011 which provides services to order flight ticket, hotel room, events/concerts ticket, attractions ticket, train ticket and also car rental.

name: Globalnet Aplikasi Indotravel (Indonesia Flight)
title: Backend Engineer
desc:
GAI is a startup company which has acquired by Global Tiket Network on late 2018. We had two products, Tiket Kereta Api (mobile app) and Indonesia Flight (web & mobile app). Tiket Kereta Api is an app to order train ticket and Indonesia Flight is an app to order flight ticket and hotel room.

As a backend engineer, I collaborate with frontend engineer and also business team. We strive to deliver fastest and most efficient results. Due to small number of team, I also have to work agile and dynamics towards any changes.

Technology used: Node.js, MySQL, Redis

name: Bina Nusantara Group
title: Junior Programmer
desc:
Bina Nusantara Group is a group company of my university. I got an opportunity to learn and work while studying as a scholar. I worked in General Affair, Marketing & Binus Center team which handles numerous web app that used by GA & Legal Department, Marketing Department and Binus Center (https: //binuscenter.com).

As a junior programmer, I developed and maintained web apps according to my Project Manager or System Analyst requirements.

Tehcnology used: ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC, Microsoft SQL, JQuery
